name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Ricky L. JONES, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Ricky L. JONES, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of July, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is
Whether the Superior Court erred in holding that it is per se reversible error to seat a discharged alternate juror after jury deliberations have begun.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
2 A.3d 467
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Ricky L. JONES, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 21, 2010.
